original_text: Then Moses returned to the Lord. He said, ‘My Lord, why have you brought trouble to these people? Why did you send me to lead them?
korean_text: 모세가 여호와께 돌아와서 아뢰되 주여 어찌하여 이 백성이 학대를 당하게 하셨나이까 어찌하여 나를 보내셨나이까

sentences.original_text: Then Moses returned to the Lord.
why have you brought trouble to these people?
Why did you send me to lead them?
sentences.korean_translation: 어찌하여 당신은 그들을 인도하기 위해 나를 보내셨습니까?'
